name: Heavyarms Assemble: WWII Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-Bit)
  • Processor: AMD A10 7850K or Intel i3-2000
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Geforce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-9400F 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics, GTX 1660 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card: DirectX compatible

short_description: This is a strategy game with the theme of WWII. As a battlefield commander, maintaining your army's motivation and satisfaction, promoting your generals, managing your own economy, dealing with your friends' armies, and real time grand battle. What kind of commander will you become in the process?
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
